description: Projeto de Desenvolvimento Socioeconômico de Sub-regiões do Nordeste do Brasil

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: This project aims to implement general strategies and tools to support the nuclei and local productive arrangements with a view to developing production of endogenous less dynamic sub-regions of Northeast Brazil. The strategies and methodologies developed through this project will provide a collection of pilot experiences to be used by the Ministry of National Integration in future regional and national interventions.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: BRA/04/024 - Social and Econom
